headline: Is Bunge Global (BG) Still Attractive After Recent Rally And Viterra Merger Plans
summary: If you are wondering whether Bunge Global is offering good value at its current price, this article walks through what the numbers are really saying about the stock. The shares recently closed at US$99.99, with returns of 7.9% over the last 7 days, 9.3% over the last 30 days, 7.9% year to date and 27.4% over the last year, so recent price action is an important starting point for any valuation check. Recent coverage has focused on Bunge Global's position in global agriculture and food supply...
